Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel

This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use box-kernel estimation.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
    EntropyCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculator, using box-kernel estimation.
    EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential entropy of a given set of observations (implementing EntropyCalculatorMultiVariate, using box-kernel estimation.
    KernelCount
    Structure to hold a kernel count, the total count it was taken from, and an array of booleans indicating which time points got counted.
    KernelEstimatorMultiVariate
    Class to maintain probability distribution function for a multivariate set, using kernel estimates.
    KernelEstimatorTransferEntropy
    Kernel estimator for computing PDFs ready for the transfer entropy.
    KernelEstimatorTransferEntropyMultiVariate
    Kernel estimator for use with the transfer entropy on multivariate source and destination.
    KernelEstimatorUniVariate
    Class to maintain probability distribution function for a single variable, using kernel estimates.
    MultiInfoCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential multi-information of a given multivariate set of observations (implementing MultiInfoCalculator), using box-kernel estimation.
    MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations (implementing MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate), using box-kernel estimation.
    PredictiveInfoCalculatorKernel
    A Predictive Information (PI) / Excess Entropy calculator (implementing PredictiveInfoCalculator) which is affected using a box-kernel Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel) to make the calculations.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernel
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two univariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlain
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two uniivariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlainIterators  
    TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelSeparate
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two uniivariate double[] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel
    Computes the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateSingleObservationsKernel
    Extends TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel for computing the differential transfer entropy (TE) between two multivariate double[][] time-series of observations using box-kernel estimation.
    TransferEntropyKernelCounts
    Structure to hold the results of the box-kernel estimation counts for one sample point.

Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel Description

This package contains estimators for the information dynamics measures which use box-kernel estimation.

These estimators apply to continuous data (i.e. double[] or double[][] data).

Author:
Joseph Lizier (email, www)
